com.fdflib.model.util

Class WhereClause

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fdflib.model.util.WhereClause

  • public class WhereClause
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to specify criteria that returned rows in queries will be constrained by. Created by brian.gormanly on 6/9/15.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • conditional

        public WhereClause.CONDITIONALS conditional
        Optional conditional used between predicates, not needed for single predicate. If no conditional is specified, AND is assumed.

      • operator

        public WhereClause.Operators operator
        Optional operator used to define what type of filtering is to be applied. Uses the OPERATORS enumeration for available options. If not definded, EQUAL (=) is assumed.

      • groupings

        public java.util.List<WhereClause.GROUPINGS> groupings
        Optional ist that contains groupings Ex. you might add to Open Parenthesis to the list to represent Where id = ? AND (( ...
